markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Bay](/Actions.aspx?ID=776) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

The shadow hound releases an eerie bay, attempting to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) each foe in a 20-foot emanation. These Demoralize attempts don't require a language and don't take any penalty due to not sharing a language.
name: Bay
